name: The Ferryman
description:
SHIFT - Kills ghost things

CTRL - pushes ghost things back (you can only see with this thing on)

Avoid ghosts cursing the one you are taking to the other side!

Avoid using too many lamp blasts and wasting ammunition!

Yay!

Probly more of an ARRRPAGGUH (RPG) than anything in the world. I mean hades, you actually play a role bruh.
